column1: @NGiustino @RepBenMcAdams Yes absolutely. Send me a message.

Comments like this are why people can’t stand Washington. I‘m glad we’re in the US not any other country. We‘re all on the same team with different perspectives whether you’re a moderate conservative or anywhere else on the political scale. @aoc #utpol https://t.co/TbhiRkiIwq
@Mr_MikeParker @SenSasse @RobertDPutnam @SenMikeLee @JECRepublicans I just finished it. Good read.
@JetScoozr77 @RepBenMcAdams Gotcha. USMCA will hopefully be up for a vote next week. So will impeachment. I’ve been pushing to adopt USCMA for months. I’m happy it will be up for a vote. That’s all.
@kete00 @RepBenMcAdams I agree. I didn’t say otherwise.
@carlosjime @RepBenMcAdams I’m all for multitasking. I do it all the time. My tweet said that we should pass the USMCA. That’s it. I’m not sure what you’re saying.
@JetScoozr77 @RepBenMcAdams I never said we should take a break from anything. Not sure where you got that idea from.
@NGiustino @RepBenMcAdams It’s been a heck of a week!
@johnsaltas Unfortunately they were giving away turnovers!
@gopTODD Thanks Todd! I’m going to ask for your advice more often so I can wisely ignore it!
@DevonReoch Great to meet you. Love our transit system!
The peaceful demonstrators in Hong Kong are modern heroes in humanity’s time worn struggle for liberty and an inspiration to freedom seekers everywhere.  #utpol https://t.co/5aw8hwZmT7

#HongKong demonstrations against repression censorship and erosion of individual and religious liberties by China and the Chinese Communist Party have captured the world’s attention. Military intervention by Beijing is the wrong way to resolve civil disagreement. #utpol
I stand with the peaceful protestors in #HongKong in support of their democracy freedoms and rule of law. The ‘one state two systems’ solution must be honored. #utpol https://t.co/5aw8hwZmT7
@lizabeth_verse @RepBenMcAdams Glad I can set such a good example!
@MichQui2 @tyrellaagard @RepBenMcAdams https://t.co/xhMfD40KvP
@megskiles @JimDabakis Uh I didn’t use any billboards in my congressional campaign. You might be thinking of the billboards attacking me?
@GoryDetails Ha! Thanks. We got a polish dog on the way out. One of my favorite meals!
@gregroper @SpencerJCox That sounds like something @SpencerJCox and I could both be found guilty of doing given the opportunity. #NoComment
@_CountyLibrary The Library of Congress has nothing on you guys! Except Abraham Lincoln’s personal possessions and inaugural bible. But nothing else!
@_CountyLibrary Aww I definitely miss you guys! I hope to see you when I’m walking in parades this week!
I was a spectator. Does that count? https://t.co/8Wt6Be62uS https://t.co/VhhWOz3lyU
@craigtrujillo Agree. The house has voted to end the policy with my support.

@craigtrujillo @RepJohnCurtis As a matter of fact I do belong to such a group. We are working hard on a bipartisan supplemental funding bill to address the crisis that should be up for a vote this week. And the Senate is doing the same. #utpol https://t.co/tZuNtfpR0C
Check out my podcast this week. #utpol https://t.co/sLPCADHjjU
@AJOrmond @RepBenMcAdams In fact I already did introduce legislation requiring a balanced budget. https://t.co/OLfGuzj1dN
What can an Olympic athlete teach a member of Congress (other than the fact that I don’t have a future as an Olympic speed skater)? Listen to my podcast to find out! #utpol https://t.co/4W49yc3pbH
@joshfranz Wish I could have been there! I was giving a speech at the veterans cemetery at Camp Williams at the same time.
@DylanCMcDonnell @dannychau Why would I give away 3 pounds of bacon? 😉
@JeremyBRoberts @oceana Dear [valued constituent]: Thank you for your [tweet] about your important issue. Your opinion is very important to me. 😉
Thanks @UtahDNR for stocking our neighborhood fishing pond! Always makes for an easy and fun weekend adventure! #utpol https://t.co/CXMM87jFr6
Check out my podcast from this week! #utpol https://t.co/q7XO42Ij6J

@John45077122 @rfhbill @RFHGina @RFHKerry Follow me on Twitter (this is my personal account) or follow my official Twitter page @RepBenMcAdams for updates on my activities. Or follow me on Facebook and Instagram too. I keep pretty busy and I’m hard at work.
Heading to DC this morning and I’m finally taking that piece of office decor to make my space complete! @rfhbill @RFHGina @RFHKerry https://t.co/ZxQEK2G7dA
Listening to #GeneralConference from the sidelines cheering one of my kid’s Saturday morning sports games is favorite tradition of mine and a perfect balance of faith and family!

@GHughes51 @JonSPierpont @slcmayor @SpencerJCox @UtahDPS @slcpd @OdysseyHouseUT @PPC_SLC @JennyWilsonUT @GovHerbert Agree! The reason to work with people who see things differently isn’t only because you have to do it if you want to get things done but because our own ideas get better when we listen with an open mind to people who can see past our own blind spots. It’s great working with you!
@MRC_SLC Sorry I missed you!
Check out my latest podcast! #utpol https://t.co/GLOkXUp5Ic
@Geographer_Tom Did it involve training them how to play chess? If no why not?
Check out my latest podcast! #utpol https://t.co/XgqKQl4v8n

@Hamza_Alwaznah @RepBenMcAdams Welcome to Utah and to America! We are a warm and friendly community. I hope you enjoy your time here and make many new friends along the way both Muslim and non-Muslim. I’m proud I get to be one of them!

@J0EBL0W @TomForUtah @Patbagley @USATODAY I don’t support family separation and have spoken out and voted to end it. But how is framing our differences like that any different than the other side saying Democrats want to ban airplanes and take away your hamburger? Debating in absurd absolutes won’t result in solutions.

@Patbagley Interesting read. I also really liked this piece by David Brooks. In an age defined by political warfare I choose to promote peace. I’m not naive to the realities of the system I’m working in but I hope to find another way forward. #utpol https://t.co/3RUileRvfW
Food is bipartisan! https://t.co/aLeqFRHn84
@DarnelApelu I’m not the one organizing the event and am just going as their invited guest but I’d be surprised if they turned anyone away. I’m sure they’d be happy to have you.
@theSqurrl @RepBenMcAdams @SantaquinCity They are amazing. We were at the Santa Queen in @SantaquinCity. Go there for the onion rings. Stay for the milkshakes. Check it out. You’ll thank me later!
@mike_winder @UtahReps Great to see you Representative Winder!
@charlie_gibbons @BenMcAdams9 Or my official account @RepBenMcAdams

My Lyft driver tonight complained that when Congress is in town the traffic around the Capitol is all gridlocked. I told him the gridlock is even worse inside the building. #utpol https://t.co/7FleZF0Jwv

After years of wondering how best to engage younger voters Congress has found a bipartisan consensus with a debate on the impact of flatulent cows. Based on years of field research with my four kids it’s a topic that always captures their interest. Congrats to us.🙄#utpol
@LeeMossNP Sorry I missed you! Working in the Utah office today. Hope to see you next time.
@AOC @AyannaPressley @RashidaTlaib @JenniferWexton Thanks @aoc! I 💜 being seatmates with you and @AyannaPressley too!
@areynarivarola @RepBenMcAdams Interesting read and important info. Thanks for sending.

Met up with my replacement newly elected Salt Lake County Mayor @JennyWilsonUT about her new gig and how we can work together. There’s a lot we agree on but the orange wall in the mayor’s office not so much. Congrats Jenny! You’ll be great! #utpol https://t.co/CdPxc7tMOZ
@amjross @JimDabakis @RepBenMcAdams @MiaBLove That’s not at all what I said.
@JimDabakis @RepBenMcAdams @MiaBLove Liberal Dabakis pays compliments to conservative Love and moderate McAdams. It keeps getting weirder. Thanks Jim! Great to see you yesterday.

@nateijie I’m in Utah meeting with people affected by the shutdown and asking for input about how they want me to vote. I’ll talk to my colleagues in DC by phone this weekend about ending the shutdown. It’s important not to lose touch with my home state. Back to DC on Monday.
@nateijie Come to my open house tomorrow (Saturday) from 1-3 if you want to share your thoughts with me.
@tvheidihatch @StewartforUtah I think I saw him a few rows ahead of us.
This is what we call “working across the aisle” in coach. @RepJohnCurtis @RepRobBishop #utpol https://t.co/3n9LmpKPEn
@SharonGF_NBCT @RepBenMcAdams @HouseBlueDogs That’s what the letter says. Open the government. Then work together on border security.
Power couple! And we are definitely in good hands with Team Litvack. https://t.co/8Q17jxmoNS

I met a TSA agent picking out some provisions on Saturday at a local food bank. He’s beyond stressed. His family can live off peanut butter and canned goods for a little while but he doesn’t know how he will pay rent. He deserves better. End the shutdown. #shutdownstories https://t.co/X7P80woDYa
@preDeeinpink You didn’t say hello? 🤷‍♂️
@BarbThur Yes that was essentially my statement.
@KennerRoy @EricMVanEpps @RepBenMcAdams Did you click on the link to read the article?

@EricMVanEpps @RepBenMcAdams And my commitment during the campaign was to stand with what I believe is right for Utah not with either party. As with many issues there are more than 2 sides. This article gave a little more context than a single tweet: https://t.co/IDLc41JIMJ
@EricMVanEpps @RepBenMcAdams That’s not at all what the tweet says. https://t.co/IDLc41JIMJ
